title: Annual net sales of Amazon 2004 to 2019
yAxis: Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 16 data points.
In general Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2004 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 280.52 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 6.92 was reached at Year 2004
